DOCUMENT ()
  BEGIN_REGION (>>>DOCUMENT)
  COMMENT_BLOCK (####################)
  title (title:: Generate Con)
    string (title:: Generate Con)
  id (id:: td-000008)
    string (id:: td-000008)
  COMMENT_BLOCK (####################)
  PARAGRAPH (This SML document co)
    string (This SML document co)
  PARAGRAPH (The 'generate' state)
    string (The 'generate' state)
  BARE_TABLE ()
    TABLE_ROW ()
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey: !!Top Level!!)
          string (:grey: )
          bold_string (Top Level)
            string (Top Level)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey:)
          string (:grey:)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey:)
          string (:grey:)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey:)
          string (:grey:)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey:)
          string (:grey:)
    END_TABLE_ROW (---)
    TABLE_ROW ()
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey: ~~problem~~)
          string (:grey: )
          italics_string (problem)
            string (problem)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey: ~~parts~~)
          string (:grey: )
          italics_string (parts)
            string (parts)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey: ~~priority~~)
          string (:grey: )
          italics_string (priority)
            string (priority)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey: ~~status~~)
          string (:grey: )
          italics_string (status)
            string (status)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey: ~~traceabilit)
          string (:grey: )
          italics_string (traceability)
            string (traceability)
    END_TABLE_ROW (---)
    TABLE_ROW ()
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (: !!Parent Problem:!)
          string (: )
          bold_string (Parent Problem:)
            string (Parent Problem:)
          string ( This is the parent )
          italics_string (technical, problem-1)
            string (technical, problem-1)
            CROSS_REF ()
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (: 2)
          string (: 2)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:yellow: routine)
          string (:yellow: routine)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey: grey)
          string (:grey: grey)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:)
          string (:)
    END_TABLE_ROW (---)
    TABLE_ROW ()
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey: !!Parent Prob)
          string (:grey: )
          bold_string (Parent Problem)
            string (Parent Problem)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey:)
          string (:grey:)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey:)
          string (:grey:)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey:)
          string (:grey:)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey:)
          string (:grey:)
    END_TABLE_ROW (---)
    TABLE_ROW ()
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey: ~~problem~~)
          string (:grey: )
          italics_string (problem)
            string (problem)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey: ~~parts~~)
          string (:grey: )
          italics_string (parts)
            string (parts)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey: ~~priority~~)
          string (:grey: )
          italics_string (priority)
            string (priority)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey: ~~status~~)
          string (:grey: )
          italics_string (status)
            string (status)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey: ~~traceabilit)
          string (:grey: )
          italics_string (traceability)
            string (traceability)
    END_TABLE_ROW (---)
    TABLE_ROW ()
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (: !!First Child Prob)
          string (: )
          bold_string (First Child Problem:)
            string (First Child Problem:)
          string ( This is the first c)
          italics_string (technical, problem-2)
            string (technical, problem-2)
            CROSS_REF ()
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (: 0)
          string (: 0)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:yellow: routine)
          string (:yellow: routine)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey: grey)
          string (:grey: grey)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:)
          string (:)
    END_TABLE_ROW (---)
    TABLE_ROW ()
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (: !!Second Child Pro)
          string (: )
          bold_string (Second Child Problem)
            string (Second Child Problem)
          string ( This is the second )
          italics_string (technical, problem-3)
            string (technical, problem-3)
            CROSS_REF ()
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (: 0)
          string (: 0)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:yellow: routine)
          string (:yellow: routine)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:grey: grey)
          string (:grey: grey)
      TABLE_CELL ()
        paragraph (:)
          string (:)
    END_TABLE_ROW (---)
    COMMENT_BLOCK (#-------------------)
  problem ()
    BEGIN_REGION (>>>problem)
    title (title:: Parent Probl)
      string (title:: Parent Probl)
    id (id:: problem-1)
      string (id:: problem-1)
    type (type:: technical)
      string (type:: technical)
    description (description:: This i)
      string (description:: This i)
    END_REGION (<<<problem)
  COMMENT_BLOCK (#-------------------)
  problem ()
    BEGIN_REGION (>>>problem)
    title (title:: First Child )
      string (title:: First Child )
    id (id:: problem-2)
      string (id:: problem-2)
    type (type:: technical)
      string (type:: technical)
    parent (parent:: problem-1)
      string (parent:: problem-1)
    description (description:: This i)
      string (description:: This i)
    END_REGION (<<<problem)
  COMMENT_BLOCK (#-------------------)
  problem ()
    BEGIN_REGION (>>>problem)
    title (title:: Second Child)
      string (title:: Second Child)
    id (id:: problem-3)
      string (id:: problem-3)
    type (type:: technical)
      string (type:: technical)
    parent (parent:: problem-1)
      string (parent:: problem-1)
    description (description:: This i)
      string (description:: This i)
    END_REGION (<<<problem)
  COMMENT_BLOCK (#-------------------)
  END_REGION (<<<DOCUMENT)
